rewards.description: Stream to let your viewers earn exclusive in-game rewards, some only available on the new servers! Plus, don’t miss the Hero Drops campaign where you can get a €10 coupon to invest in Metin2. Join the Metin2 Content Creators Program to have access to unique perks and connect with a passionate community of fellow creators! https://gf.link/m2creators

rewards.description: Keep the adventure going by streaming and letting your audience earn exclusive in-game rewards, one of which is only available on the new servers! As one of the select streamers chosen for this campaign, your channel plays a key role in introducing these exclusive drops to the community. You’re not just streaming, you’re helping shape the early experience for players, building excitement around the new servers, and offering your viewers access to rewards they can’t get anywhere else.

rewards.description:
Celebrate the launch of inZOI's first DLC, Island Getaway! 

 To mark the occasion, we're giving away the exclusive Cahaya Summer Straw Hat and Cahaya Summer Shirt through Twitch Drops. Complete your perfect summer outfit and get ready to explore the beautiful new destination, Cahaya.

Important: These items will be delivered to your in-game inventory and will be viewable in-game starting August 20th at 06:00 UTC.

In celebration of the release of the reworked Grafton Farmhouse, earn an exclusive in-game ID card & badge by taking part in two separate campaigns throughout August. 

- August 7th, 2025 - August 8th, 2025: Animated ID card and badge available by watching 1 hour of Kinetic Games Partner streams.
- August 12th, 2025  - August 26th, 2025: Standard reward campaign available to all Twitch streamers playing Phasmophobia, earnt by watching 2 hours of Phasmophobia streams.

*PLEASE NOTE: THE REWARD WILL BE AVAILABLE IN-GAME WITH THE LAUNCH OF GRAFTON FARMHOUSE ON AUGUST 12TH*

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele MMORPG- August 2.0

rewards.description: Whispers of comfort and dreams have drifted into Blackwater Town… and with them, a bundle unlike any other: the Pyjama Set!  Wrapped in softness and stitched with style, the Pyjama Body is the first of several cozy treasures. As you watch and play, you’ll also have the chance to unlock gold, glyphs and more!  Don’t sleep on it! Tune in, gear up, and claim your rewards before they vanish with the morning mist!
rewards.name: Blackwater Pyjama Party

rewards.description:
Hey Anglers,

August marks Fishing Planet’s Anniversary, and this year we are celebrating 10 years since release on Steam!

To make it truly special, we’ve prepared 10 exclusive Twitch Drop boxes packed with cool rewards, including Pond Passes for both saltwater and freshwater maps, 108,000 Credits, 27 Baitcoins, and a selection of super useful fishing items to enjoy the best anniversary celebration on the Planet! The drops will be live for almost a month, and each viewer can get all rewards by watching a total of 12 hours. 

Tight lines and let’s rock the waters together!
rewards.name: 10-for-10 Drops Campaign

rewards.description: Celebrate the Early Access launch of Stormgate with three Twitch-themed in-game cosmetics!
